body:
Day 21 - 489*
The art is kinda rough and hurts the eyes when trying to appreciate the book.
1/10.
Also, when I thought that hell had ended the retards appear and prove to be even worse than the homo erectus from before. These guys aren't even human, they are, at most under developed monkeys. I could give a dog a phone and they would write something better than this.
Ah yes, a man of excellent culture as well.
